kubectl apply -n checkoutservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: checkoutservice-policy
  namespace: checkoutservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: checkoutservice
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  ingress:

    - podSelector:

    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: payment
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: shipping
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: email
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: currency
    ports:
    - port: 5050
      protocol: TCP
EOF
